links.title: Asia Broadband Finalizes El Salvador Operations Hub For Latin America Prior to Launch of Proprietary Cryptocurrency Exchange
links.description: LAS VEGAS, Nov. 03, 2021 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via InvestorWire - Asia Broadband Inc. (OTC: AABB) ("AABB" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that the Company has established a corporate presence and satellite office in El Salvador to serve as the Company's Central and South American operations hub in preparation for the upcoming Exchange launch.

body: $AAPL NEW ARTICLE : Warren Buffett Has Spent More On Buybacks of Berkshire Hathaway Stock Than Adding To Position In Apple https://www.stck.pro/news/AAPL/17738199
$GSAT $AAPL

message.body:
$GSAT $AAPL the rumored tie-up between Apple and Globalstar is far from a rumor according to TMF.  We know there is a mystery Customer conducting engineering studies using Globalstar’s assets.  Apple has recently filed for 2 patents regarding Unmanned Drones using 3gpp 5g / lte -RAN Spectrum.  Apple does not own any private spectrum and goes out of its way not to identify the spectrum utilized for this patent.  Globalstar has recent 3gpp approved 5G / LTE Spectrum ideal for this use.  The customer had Globalstar sign an NDA engineering agreement shortly after GSAT obtained this approval.  Apple has been very quiet about Satellite tech esp during a time when every competitor is trying to launch Satellites.  The non-denial of the rumors by both sides and these secretive filings are too much to discount.   It appears like Apple wants upgrades to GSAT’s Satellite system and GSAT is wanting more money to pay for it.  The end result could be a buyout.
https://appft1.uspto.gov/netacgi/nph-Parser?Sect1=PTO1&Sect2=HITOFF&d=PG01&p=1&u=%2Fnetahtml%2FPTO%2Fsrchnum.html&r=1&f=G&l=50&s1=%2220210329460%22.PGNR.&OS=DN/20210329460&RS=DN/20210329460

$BRK $AAPL Warren Buffett Has Spent More On Buybacks of Berkshire Hathaway Stock Than Adding To Position In Apple 

https://newsfilter.io/a/cb4a3aafa9a07753e1ce7c457aeb41bf

links.title: Warren Buffett Has Spent More On Buybacks of Berkshire Hathaway Stock Than Adding To Position In Apple
links.description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc (NYSE: BRK) has spent more money on buying back its own stock than adding to its position in the company's biggest equity holding Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL). What Happened: Since the middle of 2018 through the end of 2020, Berkshire allocated $20 billion more for buybacks than purchasing additional shares of Apple.
